033b53d7340b1cab.voiceContent: As for whether I'll help, it'll depend on the situation

051a6d478467976b.voiceContent: I see that you opted for a diverse range of decorative styles

08108b6f700e90d6.voiceContent: After all, I'm not familiar with every single detail of your life

116fb771a8646785.voiceContent: Grilling meat looks easy, but it's actually difficult to do well

214859f29c9401f0.voiceContent: Is it? I don't think I'd gain experience this valuable from standard social interactions

25ea09991d5dbc6d.voiceContent: The top priority when furnishing a space is the owner's satisfaction

29470a74da819a68.voiceContent: It's fine if you can't fall asleep. Tomorrow will come regardless

3a8c7a4146de0b0c.voiceContent: Oh? Do I give you that kind of impression

3f1c6652f443322e.voiceContent: But that reminds me... I need to make myself look like I'm always occupied, so I can avoid things I don't want to do and people I don't want to interact with

4a913d0fc4fe1dec.voiceContent: If you want to live at a more leisurely pace, you can try copying a page or two from my book

4f6c76303a166dda.voiceContent: I already do what I want every day, so I can't think of a substantial answer to that question right away

56885c190b91a3b2.voiceContent: Having things to do means you're being productive, while an empty schedule indicates a more leisurely day

5714fb4e8c281522.voiceContent: Doesn't entirely suit my preferences, but that's fine with me

589be1de3eaec462.voiceContent: But before you say anything — I'm not very interested in small talk. If you need something, just get to the point

5c8eb7e59412419b.voiceContent: Once you divert their attention and energy into other matters, they should leave you alone rather quickly

619d0b626efe29ab.voiceContent: Who knows, maybe you'll become one of Teyvat's best pitmasters

6d463459e76605d1.voiceContent: You, on the other hand, have a vast social circle, so you must run into difficult people quite often

7961164c79ae3a8a.voiceContent: I figure most people would think similarly

884e3a2001c54a95.voiceContent: Good morning. It looks like you already have everything planned out for today

93f91a5ec4caadfc.voiceContent: To some extent, I want everyone to lead the lives they want to live

a1dbc7d8aeb22157.voiceContent: But now, you've learned something by interacting with me. Congratulations

a479dfdea358fb78.voiceContent: What some lack is not intellect, but patience

a9709438687a7fdd.voiceContent: I'm content with things as they are now

b27b0375793504aa.voiceContent: It's nice and quiet here. Thank you for inviting me

b4e56af539356a83.voiceContent: You could say it's the product of life experience

b5dfed68682067bf.voiceContent: But that's just my personal inclination. It may not work for you

b5f30bcd93acd296.voiceContent: Books are meant to be read, but in many households, they often serve another purpose

b6fd996979a1d162.voiceContent: Everything we need is here. You should give it a shot

c0d9c84ab0e35d37.voiceContent: Very well then. I don't like having my hands full — it interferes with my thinking process

d87bce10c85f79fb.voiceContent: Both are fine choices. I wish you all the best

eb88da622ac5e850.voiceContent: I suggest that you ask them a few questions that they'll never find exact answers to

f3315f807cd78fb8.voiceContent: I value practicality. Aesthetics aren't generally something I put into consideration

fe4d48443901fa93.voiceContent: Wouldn't it be great to live in a world without annoyances

ff773455e383f88d.voiceContent: That way, people will cause fewer headaches for each other

001e31a42b4de7eb.voiceContent: Seeing people have a private conversation in a secluded place is even more common

03144fcc16f4e156.voiceContent: The conditions and actions required to trigger this power are still unclear. If you plan to investigate further, you should pay attention to those two factors

0701787c7b4fcdc0.voiceContent: Perhaps this calls for a different postulation

07879daffeedc93b.voiceContent: Although, if someone ever brings it to the Akademiya for appraisal and certification, I wouldn't mind taking a look

114090cf3bd4a464.voiceContent: (There's dust on the bookshelves. I should tidy them up sometime and bring any unused books to the House of Daena.

3329bbd923234666.voiceContent: I see. So, the Wedjat Eye is now under the custody of the Temple of Silence

345cd898bdcc0a70.voiceContent: It was your theory in the first place... that Mehrak disappeared after working for you all this time without anything in return

4f5bd5feac0e7d8b.voiceContent: You assumed you were seeing the future. But, what if you were actually seeing the past

51cf222b5d9b0c55.voiceContent: Unfortunately, I know nothing about the route for the Flower Carriage

5218bfab330e65a2.voiceContent: As for the falling crates... During a busy time like the Sabzeruz Festival, people often stack their crates on both sides of the street, likely leading to similar accidents

5341a3bcdd8ea374.voiceContent: It's easy for mundane events to appear special

596bd85b9a4c607c.voiceContent: Don't forget to factor in the object's trajectory and the humidity level

60135272ff6241c1.voiceContent: You formulated a hypothesis based on your interpretation of the gem's abilities, yet the results fail to corroborate it

822e2bb83f3ccaf2.voiceContent: Well, if that does happen, write a report and send it to my office

a36de9e1ef6f8bc9.voiceContent: No need. Certain objects merely represent a period of history. Once the events they exemplify are brought to light, there's little value in further study

ac89ddb361cf49c5.voiceContent: That's not why I brought it up. I was simply trying to offer a change in perspective

b0e3b1c50f06b83f.voiceContent: An ingenious thought... if Mehrak and I had never met before

b3a6e663c8df9927.voiceContent: You had your mind set on a very different interpretation

b3f409bf357071d5.voiceContent: No. I just like to know when interesting things are brought back to the Akademiya. I might want to check it out..

b4f0467ecfea29d7.voiceContent: And here you are in Port Ormos, telling me all this when I'm supposed to be working

b61a32907a6c27f1.voiceContent: Perhaps seeing the underlings at the Akademiya pick up coffee for their seniors taught Mehrak something about its own situation

c3c006410e83ad13.voiceContent: Organizing festivals is not part of my job description. You really think the Akademiya could convince me otherwise

c4e9f252b905ab0d.voiceContent: And when is that supposed to be

cfdae833a0cbe2c4.voiceContent: Huh, I thought you were confident in your abilities

edb4a65d4e1b7ac3.voiceContent: The connections we make reveal a lot about the mind. The fact that you went to a dark place simply shows the way you think

ee3523dd23bde038.voiceContent: I'm needed at the House of Daena. See you later

f59e4fe8f75d5508.voiceContent: I'm not about to make the trip to the Temple of Silence for that. It's too far

f613e40827ce51c2.voiceContent: Jahangir said this was the second time his wind generator broke down. Mechanical failures of that nature come with predictable consequences. His lack of surprise suggests something similar happened in the past

056ca5fad98f4dd7.voiceContent: Book learning alone is not enough to cultivate intelligence. All those scholars in the Akademiya are prime examples

0685dce310d14346.voiceContent: I'm Alhaitham, the Akademiya's scribe. If you wish to access an archived file, please submit an application according to the prescribed format.Oh, your form isn't ready? Not to worry. You can come again on the next working day. My work hours are posted outside the office

0e8ca3e0a1932040.voiceContent: Mmm, I can taste your mastery of the seasonings

11ef09252a5527bd.voiceContent: Apparently, a lot of people think he has a bad temperament, but I don't think they're giving him a fair chance. When Kaveh built a house right over a Withering Zone and created a huge mess, it ended up being a real headache for the Forest Rangers. Even so, this Forest Ranger didn't hold it against Kaveh. He even invited Kaveh to his house for a meal. Hmm, maybe it's good people like him who allow people like Kaveh to survive

130c4ef927feb4f8.voiceContent: Let's not eat here. Mind if I... take it home

18ff70a233e867d1.voiceContent: It's just a natural phenomenon, so there's nothing to be afraid of... unless you're beneath a tree

1934a187fea5b1d2.voiceContent: It seems you're perfectly capable of taking care of yourself, so much so that you even look after that little companion of yours. I don't have any suggestions to offer you, and frankly, you probably don't need my help

2817b6e490f0c846.voiceContent: Every person should have something that they believe in and hold on to from beginning to end. Otherwise, it's easy to succumb to the vicissitudes of life and find yourself being led astray

2baa6ded5a813c89.voiceContent: How long will this require, exactly

305083017f31e762.voiceContent: It's a waste for such a capable person to remain among the Eremites. If only she'd consider my suggestion to join the Akademiya... Our work would become a lot easier with someone like her around, but a predictable life isn't exactly her cup of tea — I can understand that. *sigh* What a pity

3840a9d523aae8de.voiceContent: This is a cause for concern

394478b48a432214.voiceContent: Hmm, a contemporary flavor. Not bad

3aaeb026581573f2.voiceContent: I'll be taking some time for myself now. Goodbye

42b0caf6dc0f0968.voiceContent: Most people are wary of interacting with me. Perhaps they're afraid, or maybe they think I'm difficult to get along with. I hope to keep things this way

44e9c808015b5cd5.voiceContent: I think you're more excited than me about this progress

4f8ee1497848f631.voiceContent: Someone set up a stand on the street saying that for each handmade keychain they sold, a child in poverty would be given a meal. Kaveh bought at least a dozen....This is Sumeru, where even healthcare is free. I needn't say more

54ec76afe26f95ee.voiceContent: Mmm, I can taste your mastery of the seasonings

5a7804ede0b96c31.voiceContent: It's difficult to eat soup-like dishes while reading

5c8eea274b5d0d10.voiceContent: There are many things in this world that may catch our eye, but don't always believe what you see. If what we see in the world were all there was to it, then there'd be no need to think, would there

5d1e24d016cca89a.voiceContent: Hmm, a contemporary flavor. Not bad

636c46a48112d3a4.voiceContent: If there's nothing to do, then I'll just put on my soundproof earpieces and nap for a while

76210d9f00a4bf21.voiceContent: Based on my observations, many people inflict trouble upon themselves. Life already has enough hardships — no need to add to them

796c9609a66fd173.voiceContent: Happy birthday. I've always thought people are a little too enthusiastic about celebrating the day they were born. Wouldn't it be better to apply all that enthusiasm towards their daily lives and improve their standards of living? But you seem to have done well for yourself. I didn't know what kind of gift to get, so I'll just set up a special application channel, reserved for your submissions alone

7bab4ad55a6e1fa4.voiceContent: I'll occasionally go to the tavern for a drink after work.That's not what you needed to know about? Huh, I was under the impression that sharing what you do in your free time is more personal than telling someone your thoughts or opinions. After all, you can get those from anybody on the Message Board

7e7cd2094f383a0f.voiceContent: Oh? You're concerned about all the rumors you've heard about me?Don't bother, because I don't care whether you believe those rumors. Just don't throw extra trouble my way, and we'll be fine

83af44031cef22ce.voiceContent: Hmm, there have been many poorly written applications lately. I guess I'll just have to reject them all

84d93814c7712e70.voiceContent: The scribe's work is simple, which is exactly why I took the position

97ef21c437c3b766.voiceContent: The strengths and weaknesses of a performing artist are quite clear. Nilou knows how to play to her strengths, which enables her to live a happy and simple life

a61defa60993c125.voiceContent: Taste supersedes presentation, else you risk overcomplicating the purpose of food. I think this is simple enough to understand

a8042ca3f79dfb19.voiceContent: To be completely honest, this Dendro Vision isn't of much help to my research... However, there's no denying the effectiveness of elemental powers when settling a physical dispute, so it still proves useful at times

ad3b18dc50741c2f.voiceContent: I've never been interested in social interactions, and as you can see, my life is more comfortable than most. I'd say this is proof enough that being social is not one of life's necessities

aff360538f6ed1be.voiceContent: Curses, there's sand in my shoes

b614735c0ca8f71d.voiceContent: She's sharp and always keeps an eye out for herself. She knows how to take life by the reins and make her dreams a reality. I'm not condoning her actions, but just because we stand on different sides doesn't mean that I can't appreciate her attitude towards life

b8244bc76a2173fe.voiceContent: The hivemind case certainly added to the matra's workload, but my conscience is clear. The root cause of what ultimately transpired actually has nothing to do with me at all. I'm sure Cyno appreciates that, as he hasn't once approached me about the incident

b8408153c69a0efc.voiceContent: Don't let any of it roll away now

b87fdbf4ea0ad9cc.voiceContent: This weather is perfect for doing nothing at all

bd91384c1a27c232.voiceContent: I hope my roommate won't be hammering away on another one of his projects in the dead of night... Actually, I'd prefer if he wasn't home at all. I really don't want to wear my soundproof earpieces to bed

c2f58e10448c3344.voiceContent: Ah, so it wasn't a one-time-only thing

c41f7a21ef0e3166.voiceContent: We mustn't let those lazy Akademiya scholars know about the progress I'm making. If they catch wind of this, they'll stop at nothing to make my life even more of a hassle. I'll reject anything they send my way, of course, but the communication required to do so is a huge waste of my time

c4768ed3a5dbb7a5.voiceContent: Rather than lacing my words with rhetoric, I prefer speaking factually

c94193400e43a40e.voiceContent: Kaveh tends to be overly sensitive about everyone and everything he crosses paths with, and he's constantly making a fuss about nothing. Maybe it's because he's too emotionally fragile..

cd88d7bdc8c8dd0c.voiceContent: I like reading difficult and abstruse books, and seeing others scratch their heads in confusion.I'm only joking. I don't delight in others' misery, and rarely do I encounter a book that's difficult for me

e78a0617ef8f6b0d.voiceContent: It's getting cold, you say? I feel fine

e91da9af6e0b9fe8.voiceContent: It's a little early for me... Let me get a cup of coffee first

eadc79b961940bd6.voiceContent: Let's not eat here. Mind if I... take it home

eb35d1c0296f491a.voiceContent: Going out on a rainy day is the worst

ee209043212d7ad8.voiceContent: One should neither dismiss nor overly revere the divine. Gods require followers, and they are also part of a biological hierarchy. That's why I don't take any pride in the fact that I helped rescue a god. I hope Lesser Lord Kusanali doesn't take offense

f1289c55ebd0feaa.voiceContent: Truth serves no master. Humankind is not a vehicle for knowledge, nor is knowledge the aim of humankind

fd9f84cd173d4935.voiceContent: Once order is disrupted, the consequences spread like wildfire. I'd like to avoid such a scenario, so I can keep my life intact and uninterrupted

ffa94a311b6cfe8b.voiceContent: Don't be offended if you try to greet me on the street and I don't respond. It's simply because I'm wearing my soundproof earpieces, that's all
